definition: muscle/tendon/veins visible under the skin/sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)

sentences.english: He doubled the rubber band about the cards.
sentences.chinese: 他把橡皮筋在卡片上绕了两圈。

sentences.english: Like an array of rubber bands, the field then pulls the region back towards its original position.
sentences.chinese: 磁场就像一组橡皮筋，又把该区域拉回到其原来位置。

sentences.english: All it takes is a flying champagne cork or a shooting rubber band.
sentences.chinese: 飞起的香槟软木塞或者弹起的橡皮筋都可能是祸首。

sentences.english: Double-loop elastic bands and put them either side of the hanger to keep clothes from falling down.
sentences.chinese: 在衣架两端绕两圈橡皮筋可以防止衣服滑落。

sentences.english: The shaft now feels like a big round rubber band.
sentences.chinese: 阴蒂体现在感觉起来就像一根圆柱状的大橡皮筋。

sentences.english: Building a huge ball out of more than 175,000 rubber bands is dangerous business.
sentences.chinese: 用175000根橡皮筋做成一个球是很危险的工作。

sentences.english: Building a huge ball out of more than 175, 000 rubber bands(1) is dangerous business.
sentences.chinese: 用175000根橡皮筋做成一个球是很危险的工作。

sentences.english: My father always carries a couple rubber bands with him wherever he goes.
sentences.chinese: 不论到哪里，父亲都会随身带着一些橡皮筋。

sentences.english: A rubber band can fix that problem in jiffy.
sentences.chinese: 橡皮筋可马上解决这个问题。

sentences.english: He stretched the rubber band till it snapped.
sentences.chinese: 他拉长橡皮筋，啪地一声拉断了。

sentences.english: The little girl stretched her rubber band.
The bottom half of the road experiences tension, meaning that it elongates like a spring pulled apart.
sentences.chinese: 桥的下半部拉伸，就像是把橡皮筋拉长。

sentences.english: She used a rubber band to tie her hair.
sentences.chinese: 她用一根橡皮筋扎头发。

sentences.english: Maybe it was for my video camera, a rubber band shooter or a water gun aimer .
sentences.chinese: 也许是我的摄像机，橡皮筋射击或水枪爱慕。

sentences.english: Put a rubber band round these books.
sentences.chinese: 用一根橡皮筋把这些书扎住。

sentences.english: Shoes are inserted into the pockets through elastic bands, which secure them snugly into place.
sentences.chinese: 把鞋子插入口袋是通过橡皮筋，安全贴身鞋子进入。
